column3: 2015 james roger walton passed away on june 9
column5: az. james was born in inglewood
column7: 1956 to his parents richard and arlene walton. he was a mechanic and was married to jodi ann walton. thoughts and condolences may be submitted to the family at www. lietz-frazefuneralhome. com arrangements were placed under the care of lietz-fraze funeral home and crematory.
